channel.title: Making an item unspawnable but able to be bought [PI]
channel.description:
Let me explain my server. It is a spawning server and I made it so you cannot spawn the item 14484 (claws). Now, when you buy it from the shop, it says what I want it to say when you try to spawn it, "This item can be earned from PK points." AND it takes your PK points. :s
I need to fix this, players are raging, I need help fast O.O

item.title: Making an item unspawnable but able to be bought [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Let me explain my server. It is a spawning server and I made it so you cannot spawn the item 14484 (claws). Now, when you buy it from the shop, it says what I want it to say when you try to spawn it, “This item can be earned from PK points.” AND it takes your PK points. :s

I need to fix this, players are raging, I need help fast O.O
